name: Navigator.presentation
description: The presentation property of Navigator serves as the entry point for the Presentation API and returns a reference to Presentation object.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The presentation property of Navigator serves as the entry point for the Presentation API and returns a reference to Presentation object.
